DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine wether the interface (facial or nasal mask) influences performance in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease exercising with non-invasive ventilation.
DOC.brief_title: Interfaces of Non-invasive Ventilation on Performance in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
